title: Scrape Crunchbase recent funding rounds
author: Lucas Perret
readme:
Get recent funding rounds from Crunchbase in Google Sheets,

along with 10+ data points (LinkedIn URL, monthly traffic, company size, etc.)

You’ll be able to:

  * Create a custom database
  * Reach out to interesting leads at the right time
  * Send custom alerts to your tools



This workflow scrape recent funding rounds from Crunchbase, and add them in Google Sheets.

It uses Piloterr API to get this data with ease.

Full guide can be found here: <https://lempire.notion.site/Get-recent-fundraising-in-Google-Sheets-dafbbda2635544b4925c4fb04abac8f5?pvs=74>
readme_zh:
在Google表格中获取Crunchbase最新融资轮次信息，

并附带10多项数据点（领英链接、月度流量、公司规模等）

您将能够：

* 创建自定义数据库
* 在最佳时机联系潜在客户
* 向您的工具发送定制提醒

该工作流会抓取Crunchbase近期融资动态，并自动同步至Google表格。

通过Piloterr API可轻松实现数据获取。

完整指南详见：<https://lempire.notion.site/Get-recent-fundraising-in-Google-Sheets-dafbbda2635544b4925c4fb04abac8f5?pvs=74>
